alert.note: Alert for Northern Jasper; Northern Newton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 1:02PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT WEST CENTRAL VERNON PARISH... NORTHERN NEWTON AND NORTHEASTERN JASPER COUNTIES THROUGH 145 PM CST... At 102 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Farrsville, or 9 miles west of Burkeville, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to vegetation and outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Jasper, Newton, Burkeville, Jamestown, Farrsville, Harrisburg, Burr Ferry, Mayflower, Stringtown, Evans, and Wiergate. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 700 PM CST for west central Louisiana...and southeastern Texas.
